name: My Name Is Bunny
description:
Made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 38 Compo - Theme: A Small World!

By https://twitter.com/_alexanderClay

Ludum Dare Compo page: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/38/my-name-is-...

Feedback welcomed!

-----------------

Country borders do not stop cunning people. Or a Syrian. (LD38 Compo)

Use arrows or WASD to move camera! Press H to hide/show the HUD.

BTW. The game has an ending, and I'm very proud of it!
